headline: Tell HN: Exercise caution with links to archive sites
description:
Some users comment on posts with links to various archiving sites containing copies of linked article. This is obviously welcome when linked article is a garden / behind paywall but often the article is perfectly readable with JS disabled and archive site requires running Google's, Cloudflare's JS code or worse.

Some archive sites - like archive.ph - attempt to run malicious code on viewers' devices. It seems that archive.ph's copies of various articles[1] all attempt to run at least a script from mail.ru domain that appears[2] to "harvest data from the page (references to "gender", "age", etc) and some shady-named variables like "bait". Also a function that fetches data from top-fwz1.mail.ru and then tries to submit a hidden 1px*1px form created in an iframe using this data (...)"

[1] https://hn.algolia.com/?dateRange=all&page=0&prefix=false&query=archive.ph&sort=byDate&type=comment

[2] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30669851
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：谨慎对待档案网站的链接
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：謹慎對待檔案網站的鏈接
description_zh-Hans:
一些用户在评论帖子时，会将链接指向含有链接文章副本的各种存档网站。当链接的文章是花园/付费墙后，这显然是受欢迎的，但往往文章在禁用JS的情况下完全可以阅读，而存档网站需要运行谷歌、Cloudflare的JS代码或更糟。

有些存档网站--如archive.ph--试图在浏览者的设备上运行恶意代码。似乎archive.ph的各种文章的副本[1]都试图运行至少一个来自mail.ru域名的脚本，该脚本似乎[2]是为了"收获页面上的数据（提及"性别"、"年龄"等）和一些名为"饵"的阴暗变量。还有一个从top-fwz1.mail.ru获取数据的函数，然后试图用这些数据提交一个在iframe中创建的隐藏的1px*1px的表单(...)"

[1] https://hn.algolia.com/?dateRange=all&page=0&prefix=false&query=archive.ph&sort=byDate&type=comment

[2] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30669851
description_zh-Hant:
一些用戶在評論帖子時，會將鏈接指向含有鏈接文章副本的各種存檔網站。當鏈接的文章是花園/付費牆後，這顯然是受歡迎的，但往往文章在禁用JS的情況下完全可以閱讀，而存檔網站需要運行谷歌、Cloudflare的JS代碼或更糟。

有些存檔網站--如archive.ph--試圖在瀏覽者的設備上運行惡意代碼。似乎archive.ph的各種文章的副本[1]都試圖運行至少一個來自mail.ru域名的腳本，該腳本似乎[2]是為了"收穫頁面上的數據（提及"性別"、"年齡"等）和一些名為"餌"的陰暗變量。還有一個從top-fwz1.mail.ru獲取數據的函數，然後試圖用這些數據提交一個在iframe中創建的隱藏的1px*1px的表單(...)"

[1] https://hn.algolia.com/?dateRange=all&page=0&prefix=false&query=archive.ph&sort=byDate&type=comment

[2] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30669851
